This function will allow for browsing and downloading of any Contact Us events that are stored.
This function will allow for the quick addition of a Customer.
This function provides the ability to search for customers in the database. A list of customers is displayed, with a click-through to the Customer Detail screen
* Only specify if the images are defined as file-names only in the XLS input; this will define the directory where they are located
This function will allow for the quick addition of a Sales Order.

Import Product Catalog and Item data. Setup selectable and descriptive features.
This function will read an Excel import file that defines Product Information. There are options to re-load (remove existing and load fresh) or append to the Product entities.
This function allows for the configuration of all promotions.
This function allows for the management of all promotions.
This function provides the ability to view promotions and gauge the usage for a certain time period.
This function allows for the creation of a new Promotion.
This function will allow for browsing and downloading of any Request Catalog events that are stored.
Add a Review
Search, review and edit any consumer reviews.
This function will generate a sitemap.xml and display the results within this browser. You may then save and deploy the file as appropriate. Sitemap URL’s will include all active Product Catalog data and Static Pages.
This function will refresh the SEO Friendly URL Mapping File (XML).
This function will re-index SOLR. It should be executed whenever the Product Catalog is updated so that PLP, PDP and Faceted Navigation is refreshed.
Quick link to add a Store.

Used in PLP “alternate” image view (typically on hover)
This tool will compare the Label / Captions file installed on this server (the “A” version) with another instance (the “B” version). Access to the “B” version is required.
This tool will compare the SYSTEM_PARAMETERS database entity on this server (the “A” version) with another instance (the “B” version). Access to the “B” database is required.
ECOMMERCE Implementation: Load new CSS files onto the server; change which CSS file is "active".
ADMIN MODULE Implementation: Load new CSS files onto the server; change which CSS file is "active".
ECOMMERCE Implementation: Simple edit and Save-As capability so that the primary CSS file can be modified.
ADMIN MODULE Implementation: Simple edit and Save-As capability so that the primary CSS file can be modified.
